header_text: You're working on a project at home, fully involved in the task at hand. You're having difficulty moving on to the next task, finding yourself repeatedly going back to double-check small details you've already completed, causing you to feel frustrated by the lack of progress. After taking a break, you remember that taking a step back to reassess is wise.
